verbs.description: ATLANTA , GA -- [ARG0: A teacher in Georgia] [V: responded] [ARGM-MNR: the only way she knew how] [ARGM-TMP: after receiving a letter from President Donald Trump filled with grammar mistakes : covering the paper with ink and yellow highlighted corrections] .

ATLANTA , GA -- A teacher in Georgia responded [ARGM-MNR: the only way] [ARG0: she] [V: knew] [ARG1: how] after receiving a letter from President Donald Trump filled with grammar mistakes : covering the paper with ink and yellow highlighted corrections .

ATLANTA , GA -- A teacher in Georgia responded the only way [ARG0: she] knew how after [V: receiving] [ARG1: a letter from President Donald Trump filled with grammar mistakes] : covering the paper with ink and yellow highlighted corrections .

ATLANTA , GA -- A teacher in Georgia responded the only way she knew how after receiving [ARG1: a letter from President Donald Trump] [V: filled] [ARG2: with grammar mistakes] : covering the paper with ink and yellow highlighted corrections .

ATLANTA , GA -- A teacher in Georgia responded the only way she knew how after receiving a letter from President Donald Trump filled with grammar mistakes : [V: covering] [ARG1: the paper] [ARG2: with ink and yellow highlighted corrections] .
